abstract: Out of sensitivity to outfielder Josh Hamilton, Texas continued its custom of keeping Champagne out of its on-field celebration.
snippet: Out of sensitivity to outfielder Josh Hamilton, Texas continued its custom of keeping Champagne out of its on-field celebration.
lead_paragraph: ARLINGTON, Tex. - As has become their custom, the Texas Rangers celebrated their second consecutive American League pennant by spraying ginger ale on one another on the field after their 15-5 victory against the Detroit Tigers in the American League Championship Series on Saturday night.

headline.main: Ginger Ale Remains the Rangers' Bubbly of Choice
